timeline.message:
Fix node health-check-related test failures

In #52680 we introduced a new health check mechanism. This commit fixes
up some sporadic related test failures, and improves the behaviour of
the `FollowersChecker` slightly in the case that no retries are
configured.

Closes #59252
Closes #59172

timeline.bodyText: We should check the failure count last so we can report more specific errors (disconnected etc) if available.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText: No need to check the path starts with / and, indeed, it doesn't on Windows.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
